什么是地理限制以及为什么需要它们？

用户的 IP 地址是连接到互联网的每个设备的独特标识符，用于确定用户的位置。用户所在的国家、地区、城市，有时甚至可以从他们的 IP 地址确定街道。内容提供商可以根据此信息选择允许或拒绝用户访问。

法律合规、许可协议和不同的业务战略需要地理限制。这些限制可能由国家或为您提供服务的公司发布。

地理限制是一种常见且有问题的做法。虽然它们可能有有效的防御措施，但它们也会给想要从任何位置访问所需内容的消费者带来困难和烦恼。某些用户可能会使用 VPN（虚拟专用网络）、代理和其他技术来绕过地理限制并访问受地理限制的内容。

什么是VPN？

VPN通过私人服务而不是用户的普通互联网服务提供商 (ISP) 引导设备的互联网连接。 VPN 通过隐藏用户的 IP 地址，充当用户和互联网之间的中间人。

通过私有的加密隧道，用户的设备可以访问互联网，同时隐藏他们的身份、位置和其他数据。所有网络流量都通过 VPN 安全连接。因此，使用 VPN 而不是用户的 PC 来传输通过 Internet 传输的任何数据。

2020 年 7 月，美国联邦法院最终批准了 5000 万美元的集体诉讼和解，涉及 Apple 的持续法律纠纷出现重大进展。该决议有效地平息了对苹果的指控，声称这家科技巨头故意隐瞒了 2015 年至 2019 年间生产的各种MacBook 、MacBook Air 和 MacBook Pro 机型中安装的“蝴蝶”键盘固有的不稳定性。

主持此案的尊敬的爱德华·达维拉法官于周四作出判决，认可和解协议“公平、充分和合理”。该裁决是解决受键盘故障影响的众多消费者提出的担忧和申诉的决定性里程碑。

作为获得批准的和解协议的结果，因 MacBook 设备键盘缺陷而遭受痛苦的个人将有权获得 50 美元至 395 美元不等的赔偿金。这笔经济赔偿是和解协议的重要组成部分，旨在解决受影响的 MacBook 用户的不满。值得一提的是，集体成员在 3 月截止日期前提交了 86,000 份索赔，数量惊人，凸显了问题的重要性和规模。

问题可以追溯到2015年

有问题的“蝴蝶”键盘的起源可以追溯到 Apple 于 2015 年推出，最初在 12 英寸 MacBook 机型上首次亮相。这种创新的键盘机制得到了 Apple 前设计主管 Jony Ive 的支持，他将其设想为一种解决方案，使公司能够在不影响稳定性或打字体验的情况下打造更轻薄的笔记本电脑。然而，随着越来越多的 Apple 电脑采用蝶形键盘设计，用户开始意识到它容易受到微小灰尘、污垢和碎屑颗粒的影响，从而导致严重的操作问题和挫败感。

在 2015 年至 2019 年期间，Apple 的笔记本电脑系列采用了蝴蝶键盘，遗憾的是，事实证明即使在典型的使用条件下也容易出现故障。灰尘、污垢甚至小食物颗粒等看似无害的元素的积累可能会导致按键无响应或完全卡住，从而导致键盘无法操作。因此，受这些持续存在的问题影响的用户不得不对这家科技巨头提起法律诉讼。

一个重要的转折点是，Apple 在 2019 年底推出了 16 英寸 MacBook Pro，实现了对更传统的“剪刀式开关”键盘设计的回归。此举是在 Apple 工程师努力进行各种调整和增强以增强键盘的整体耐用性和可靠性之后做出的。

值得一提的是，作为和解协议的一部分，苹果没有义务承认任何不当或不当行为。虽然和解旨在解决问题并向受影响的个人提供赔偿，但 Apple 不承担正式承认此事中任何过错的义务。

在集体诉讼中引发反对的事态发展中，为特定索赔人群体支付 125 美元的提议遭到了抵制。然而，他们要求改变支付金额的上诉最终被审理此案的法官驳回。因此，初始结算条款（包括 125 美元的付款）保持不变。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 QBot 恶意软件利用 Windows WordPad EXE 接管帖子首先出现在gHacks Technology News上。

;

最近观察到 QBot 恶意软件使用一种复杂的技术通过利用广泛使用的 Windows 10 写字板程序中的 DLL 劫持漏洞来感染计算机。通过利用此缺陷，恶意软件可以逃避安全软件的检测，使其成为用户和组织等机构的重要关注点。

本文深入探讨了 DLL 劫持的复杂性以及 QBot 使用的具体方法，阐明了该恶意软件的潜在风险和影响。

什么是DLL劫持？

DLL 或动态链接库是包含多个程序可以同时使用的功能的基本文件。当应用程序启动时，它会在指定的 Windows 文件夹中搜索所需的 DLL 并相应地加载它们。

值得注意的是，与可执行文件位于同一文件夹中的 DLL 具有优先权，并且会先于其他文件加载。此层次结构为恶意行为者提供了利用 DLL 劫持漏洞的机会。

QBot利用写字板DLL劫持

QBot 最初被认为是一种银行木马，但后来演变成一种多功能的恶意软件植入程序，它已经与 Black Basta、Egregor 和 Prolock 等勒索软件组织建立了合作伙伴关系。它们共同针对企业网络进行勒索攻击。

据 Cryptolaemus 成员兼安全研究员 ProxyLife 称，QBot 恶意软件最近发起了一场网络钓鱼活动，利用 Windows 10 写字板可执行文件 write.exe 中的 DLL 劫持漏洞。

恶意事件链

当用户单击网络钓鱼电子邮件中包含的下载链接时，会从远程主机获取 ZIP 存档。在存档文件中，存在两个关键组件：document.exe（伪装成 Windows 10 写字板可执行文件）和一个名为 edputil.dll 的 DLL 文件，它可以实现 DLL 劫持。进一步调查显示，document.exe 实际上是用于启动 Windows 10 写字板文档编辑器的合法 Write.exe 可执行文件的重命名副本。

执行时，document.exe 会尝试加载真正的 DLL 文件 edputil.dll，该文件通常位于 C:\Windows\System32 文件夹中。但是，document.exe 并没有严格检查该特定位置的 DLL，而是优先加载在其自己的文件夹中找到的具有相同名称的任何 DLL。

抓住这个机会，威胁参与者创建了一个恶意版本的 edputil.dll 并将其放置在与 document.exe 相同的文件夹中，以确保加载恶意软件。

利用加载的 DLL

加载恶意 DLL 后，QBot 恶意软件会继续使用 C:\Windows\system32\curl.exe 从远程主机秘密下载伪装成 PNG 图像的 DLL 文件。当通过 rundll32.exe 执行时，这个欺骗性文件会释放恶意软件的真正功能。

QBot 现在在后台静默运行，为未来的网络钓鱼攻击窃取电子邮件，并下载额外的有效负载，例如 Cobalt Strike，这是威胁行为者用来获得对受感染设备的初始访问权限的流行工具包。通过渗透 Windows 写字板等受信任的程序，QBot 设法逃避检测并执行其恶意活动。

;

微软日前发布了适用于 Windows 11 版本 22H2 的KB5026446 。 Windows 更新的官方更新日志仅列出了两个新功能，尽管它还包括操作系统的 Moments 3 更新的功能。

一些用户可能想知道这是怎么回事。解释很简单：微软决定将 Moments 3 更新的功能与 Windows 11 版本 22H2 的实际预览更新分开。

Windows 配置更新随即发挥作用。它拥有Moments 3 更新和任何未来 Moments 更新的功能的关键。 设备是否获得配置更新取决于新的 Windows Update 设置Get Updates as soon as they're available ，我之前解释过。

当在 Windows 更新中或通过组策略启用该设置时，设备将收到解锁设备新功能所需的配置更新。仅下载常规 KB5026446 的设备仅接收该更新的更改，而不是 Moments 更新的更改。

微软在其支持网站上发布了一个新的 Windows 配置更新历史页面。该公司将在那里发布 Windows 11 的所有配置更新，并且可能还会发布 Windows 的未来版本。

该公司解释说：“此处列出的更新是使用 Controlled Feature Rollout (CFR) 技术开启的。使用 CFR，我们逐渐推出新功能。当我们确认每个功能都准备就绪后，我们将逐步将其推广到其他设备.最终，它将包含在以后的每月更新中。”

目前，页面上仅列出了2023 年 5 月 24 日的配置更新。它列出了与 Windows 11 操作系统的 Moments 3 更新相关的所有功能改进。

Windows 11 设备将在操作系统的累积更新中接收 Moments 3 更新的功能，可能会在 2023 年 6 月 13 日星期二的 2023 年 6 月补丁程序中获得。

如果 Windows 11 管理员不想在 Windows 更新或组策略中启用“尽快获取最新更新……”选项，他们可以使用 ViVeTool 启用这些功能。

总结一下：

  • 从 Moments 3 开始，安装预览更新已经不足以接收 Moments 功能更新，并且可能在未来尽早接收其他更新。
  • “尽早获取更新”框决定设备是否会接收配置更新以解锁新功能。
  • ViVeTool 可用于解锁功能，而无需启用提前获取更新选项。
  • 功能更新将作为累积更新的一部分提供给所有 Windows 11 用户。

在首席执行官雷内哈斯 (Rene Haas) 在台北Computex发表备受期待的主题演讲之前，Arm 发布了一项重要声明，推出了两款旨在提高智能手机性能的创新产品。其中第一个是第四代 Cortex-X 内核，称为 Arm Cortex-X4。拥有令人印象深刻的速度，Arm 宣布 Cortex-X4 是他们迄今为止最快的 CPU，并承诺与其前身 Cortex-X3 相比性能提升 15%。

Cortex-X4 专注于支持人工智能和基于机器学习的应用程序，旨在提供无与伦比的用户体验并促进高级任务的无缝执行。此次发布展示了 Arm 坚定不移地致力于突破移动技术的界限并推动智能手机性能的发展。

Arm 产品线的另一个值得注意的补充是 Arm Immortalis-G720，它利用了第五代 GPU 架构。基于其前身 Immortalis-G715 GPU 的成功，它已经通过与联发科的合作进入 OPPO 和 vivo 的旗舰设备，Arm 的最新 GPU 产品将目光投向了在高几何游戏和实时 3D 应用程序。

以在移动设备上模拟类似游戏机的游戏体验为愿景，第五代 GPU 架构展示了 Arm 致力于突破移动游戏的界限并为用户提供身临其境和迷人的视觉体验。

Cortex-X4 强调能效

据 Arm 称，与其前身 Cortex-X3 相比，Cortex-X4 微架构显着提高了能效。 Cortex-X4声称在相同的过程中功耗降低了40%，增强了响应能力并加快了应用程序的启动速度，为用户提供更流畅、更高效的体验。

除了 Cortex-X4，Arm 还推出了他们最新的移动计算平台 Arm Total Compute Solutions 2023 (TCS23)。这个综合平台融合了尖端的知识产权，包括 Immortalis GPU、Armv9 CPU 和软件增强功能。针对使用 Arm 的 IP 包创建自己的计算子系统的片上系统 (SoC) 设计人员，TCS23 平台专为高端智能手机变体量身定制。

What is “Status Archive” on WhatsApp and how does it work?

As part of these ongoing efforts, certain businesses now have access to a new feature known as "Status Archive," which becomes available upon installing one of the latest updates from the WhatsApp beta for Android via the Google Play Store.

In the event that this feature is activated for your WhatsApp account, you will receive a notification banner within the Status section, as depicted in the accompanying screenshot shared by WABetaInfo . Google has suspended the Downloader app from its Google Play Store following a complaint lodged under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). The complaint, submitted by Israeli TV companies, alleges that the app facilitates access to the copyright-infringing website SDAROT .

Despite the availability of other standard browsers capable of loading the same pirate website, Google decided to take action against the popular app, which had amassed over 5 million installations.

App's developer Elias Saba has tweeted this:

I need your help! My Downloader app has been wrongly removed from @GooglePlay Store due to an absurd DMCA takedown from Israel TV @yescoil that claims because the web browser in the app can load a specific website with their infringed content that my app is violating copyright.

— AFTVnews (@AFTVnews) May 19, 2023

Suspension of the Downloader app

The Downloader app, developed by Elias Saba, serves as a utility tool, combining a basic file manager with a web browser. However, according to the complaint, the app enables users to view SDAROT, a website notorious for copyright infringement.

Saba, in response, argues that the app merely provides a means to navigate to websites through its web browser functionality. Furthermore, he emphasizes that the app does not direct or encourage users to access any specific websites, except for his own blog , which loads as the default homepage.

While the Downloader app has been suspended on Google Play, it remains available through alternative channels. Users can still acquire the app from the Amazon app store for devices like Fire TV s or directly download it from the Downloader app's website as an APK file. Saba expressed his frustration with the suspension, highlighting the inconsistency in singling out his app when other browsers, including Google Chrome, also have the capability to load infringing websites.

Saba promptly filed appeals through both the Google Play Console and Google's DMCA counter-notification form. Unfortunately, his appeal via the Play Console was swiftly rejected, leaving him awaiting a response to his appeal filed through the DMCA counter-notification form. Saba hopes that public attention and support will prompt Google to reconsider its decision and reinstate the app.

DMCA's complaint

The DMCA complaint against the Downloader app was filed by a law firm representing several Israeli TV companies, including HOT Telecommunications Systems, DBS Satellite Services, United King Video, and Charlton.

The complaint references permanent injunctions issued by an Israeli court and a US federal court against the SDAROT website. However, despite these legal actions, the website in question continues to be operational.

The rise of AI in search engines

Artificial intelligence has experienced a meteoric rise across various domains in recent years. One of its most prevalent applications is in search engines, where AI-powered tools are employed to assist users in searching for information, answering questions, and receiving personalized recommendations.

At the forefront of this technological advancement are three notable AI tools: ChatGPT, Bing, and Google Bard. Each of these tools offers distinct features and capabilities, catering to the diverse needs of users.

聊天GPT

ChatGPT, developed by OpenAI, is an AI language model founded on the GPT-3.5 architecture, comprising multiple layers of artificial neural networks. Its primary function revolves around engaging in conversations with users, addressing their queries, and providing information on a wide array of topics. ChatGPT has garnered an active user base of approximately 100 million.

To train ChatGPT , a vast corpus of text from the internet is utilized as its training data. This data undergoes tokenization, which involves breaking down the text into individual tokens such as words or punctuation marks. It is important to note that the training data is unlabeled, allowing the model to discern patterns and relationships within the text without explicit labels or annotations.

Accessing ChatGPT is a seamless process via a web-based interface, enabling users to initiate conversations with the tool effortlessly. This AI model proves particularly useful in tasks requiring natural language processing, including customer service, technical support, and personal assistance.

However, ChatGPT does possess certain limitations. Although it can provide information on a diverse range of topics, its responses may not always be as accurate as those generated by a search engine like Bing. Moreover, when confronted with complex or technical queries, ChatGPT might encounter challenges, as its responses are derived from pre-existing data rather than real-time search results.

Bing

Bing, crafted by Microsoft, stands as a search engine employing a blend of machine learning algorithms, statistical models, and heuristics to deliver relevant search outcomes to users. With a market share of approximately 2.79% according to StatCounter GlobalStats data from April 2023, Bing has firmly established itself as one of the leading search engines worldwide.

The training data for Bing consists of diverse sources, including user queries, search results, and web pages. Bing harnesses both supervised and unsupervised learning techniques during training. In the supervised learning approach, the model is trained using labeled data, encompassing user queries and search results. On the other hand, the unsupervised learning approach involves extracting features and patterns from the textual data, enabling the model to better comprehend the semantics and context of search queries.

An intriguing aspect of Bing is its image search functionality, which employs computer vision to understand image content and provide more precise search outcomes. This makes Bing an excellent resource for users seeking images for presentations or other projects. Furthermore, Bing seamlessly integrates with various Microsoft products, such as Office and Windows, simplifying the process of accessing and sharing search results across different platforms. Additionally, Bing offers a unique feature called "Bing Rewards," allowing users to accumulate points through their searches, which can later be redeemed for gift cards, discounts, and other rewards.

Bing also offers a chatbot feature, capable of answering questions, providing recommendations, and executing user tasks. While it excels in simpler tasks like setting reminders and scheduling appointments, its conversational abilities are not as sophisticated as those of ChatGPT.

Google Bard

Google Bard, an AI language model developed by Google, harnesses the power of LaMDA (Language Model for Dialogue Applications). This tool primarily aims to assist users in composing poetry and song lyrics by suggesting rhymes and phrases. Although still in its beta phase, Google Bard's underlying architecture integrates neural networks, statistical models, and generative algorithms.
